tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE bookstore_books (
  book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  author VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  copies_available INT
)

CREATE TABLE books (
  book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  author VARCHAR(255),
  num_copies INT
)

CREATE TABLE authors (
  author_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  nationality VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE book_stock (
  stock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  book_id INT,
  num_available INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (book_id) REFERENCES books(book_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Books (book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
           book_title VARCHAR(255),
           author VARCHAR(255),
           genre VARCHAR(50),
           copies_available INT);

CREATE TABLE Authors (author_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
           author_name VARCHAR(255),
           nationality VARCHAR(50),
           birth_year INT);

CREATE TABLE Genres (genre_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
           genre_name VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE BookstoreInventory (inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
           book_id INT,
           copies_in_stock INT,
           FOREIGN KEY (book_id) REFERENCES Books(book_id));

CREATE TABLE books (
    book_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(255),
    published_year INT,
    num_copies INT
)

CREATE TABLE authors (
    author_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    author_name VARCHAR(255),
    nationality VARCHAR(100),
    birth_year INT,
    num_books_published INT
)

CREATE TABLE book_copies (
    copy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    book_id UUID REFERENCES books(book_id),
    condition VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    availability BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE genres (
    genre_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    genre_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE book_ratings (
    rating_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    book_id UUID REFERENCES books(book_id),
    rating FLOAT,
    review TEXT,
    user_id UUID
)
